newsitem.title: BANGLADESH: Bangladesh taka ends flat against dollar.
newsitem.headline: Bangladesh taka ends flat against dollar.

text.p: The Bangladesh taka closed flat at 42.8150/8250 to the dollar in a dull interbank session on Monday, dealers said.
The local currency was quoted at 42.8100/8300 per dollar in early trade but most deals were done at 42.8200 level.
Dealers said there had been poor activity mostly due to a market holiday in the United States.
The interbank call money rates finished steady at 9.25 to 9.50 percent against previous at 9.0-9.5 percent.
